name: Tappy Knife
description:
==================/INFO/===================

Welcome to Knife Hit! A game where you throw knives at a target! Your goal is to fit as many knives as possible into the tiny spinning wood circle! Good luck and Enjoy!

==============/INSTRUCTIONS/===============

How to Play

-Gather Knives!

-Attack The Wood!

-Discover Codes!

================/CREDITS/==================

Inspiration is the Original Mobile Game “Knife Hit” on the app store. 

100% of Code by @ZenMakR

=================/CODES/==================

“Pixelated” - Pixel Knife

“Recolor” - Recolored Basic Knife

“Ninjago” - Shuriken

“TipsyTripsy” - Tipped Knife

“Cliffhanger” - Hooked Knife

“Construction” - Screwdriver
